Articles.Content:
Hello fellow kerbalnauts my name is hypersonicsummer03 but I don't care what you call me, and I am pleased to join the forums. I have been playing ksp for quite some time ( April of 2015 to be exact ) and I was just to lazy to sign up. Although nevertheless, here I am! Other than ksp I like Star Wars, simcity, and about any combat game. I am a somewhat experienced player with about 500 hours of gameplay according to steam, but I still have a lot to learn!

with high regards:

hypersonicsummer03

Greetings and welcome to the forums, @Hypersonicsummer03.

I play a bit of Arma 3 which is a good distraction from KSP sometimes.  I look forward to reading your mission reports and your contributions to the forum.
Welcome to the forums! I think you would like the BDarmory mod if you want some combat in your KSP game.
